channel.title: Choosing between different starter packages?
channel.description:
Hey Mopar,
I was wondering, is it possible that when you log in for the first time, you get like a popup where you can choose which starter package you want. Like melee, ranged, magic, skiller, etc.
Haven't found any tutorials about it yet, does anyone of you guys know how to or if there's a tutorial?
Thanks alot!
Mthijs3

item.title: Choosing between different starter packages?
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

Thanks for the comments guys, I’ll see what i can do

Read full topic

item.title: Choosing between different starter packages?
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

You could always just have a chatbox pop-up. They’re pretty basic and easy to do, probably quicker and take up less space in the cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Choosing between different starter packages?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Making an interface would probably look professional and easy. the only trouble you could have is not knowing how to hard-code the interfaces and getting the images. gl

Read full topic

item.title: Choosing between different starter packages?
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:2, topic:523735”]Yeah, just make an interface like:
CLICK WHICH STARTER PACKAGE YOU WISH TO HAVE:

RANGED / MELEE / MAGIC / SKILLER

etc… For a bit of help on how to make this interface pop up, look at the makeover mage interface for when you first login.[/quote]

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Choosing between different starter packages?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Yeah, just make an interface like:
CLICK WHICH STARTER PACKAGE YOU WISH TO HAVE:

RANGED / MELEE / MAGIC / SKILLER

etc… For a bit of help on how to make this interface pop up, look at the makeover mage interface for when you first login.

Read full topic
